DOC.brief_summary: This study compare plasma pharmacokinetics single 125mg oral dose palbociclib presence absence rifampin-mediated enzyme induction fixed-sequence two-period study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Drug-Drug Interaction Potential Of Rifampin OnThe Investigational Agent Palbociclib ( PD-0332991 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchildbearing potential body mass index 17.530.5 kg/m2 total body weight great 50kg Evidence history clinically significant physiologic , psychological , medical condition positive drug screen alcohol breath test baseline ECG demonstrate QTc > 450msecs QRS interval > 120msecs
